name: Surf Music
description: Evolved from late 1950s instrumental Rock & Roll in the USA, particularly associated with the surfing culture in Southern California.

children.name: Hot Rod Music
children.description: Features prominent lyrics about hot rods and car culture and incorporates Sound Effects and guitar textures to mimic sounds made by automobiles.

children.name: Indie Surf
children.description: Reverb-drenched, nostalgic, and often lo-fi, with influences from Surf Rock and Vocal Surf; rose to popularity around 2009.

children.name: Surf Punk
children.description: Punk Rock that incorporates elements of Surf Rock.

children.name: Surf Rock
children.description: Short instrumental songs with Rock & Roll rhythms overlaid with cheerful melodies played on reverb-drenched tremolo guitar.

children.name: Vocal Surf
children.description: Appropriates the sounds of instrumental Surf Rock, combining surfing- and car-themed lyrics with a style that draws primarily from Doo-Wop and Rock & Roll.
